cmb:
MANA COST: 95/105/115/125
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.
lore: Even the mightiest of warriors crumble before the terror of Atropos.
name: bane_enfeeble

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Pure
cmb:
MANA COST: 125/150/175/200
COOLDOWN: 14
desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, dealing damage and gaining health equal to the damage dealt.
notes: Bane always receives the full amount of health, regardless of the amount of damage dealt.
lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
name: bane_brain_sap

cmb:
MANA COST: 165/165/165/165
COOLDOWN: 16/15/14/13
desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
notes:
Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself.
Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred.
In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.
lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
name: bane_nightmare

affects:
ABILITY: Channeled, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
MANA DRAIN: 5%
DURATION: 5 / 5 / 5
DAMAGE: 100 / 155 / 215
SCEPTER MANA DRAIN: 10%
SCEPTER DURATION: 7 / 7 / 7
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 155 / 215 / 270
cmb:
MANA COST: 200/300/400
COOLDOWN: 100
desc:
CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from magic immune units, but not damage them. Aghanim's Scepter Fiend's Grip also causes anyone who attacks Bane while he is channeling to be afflicted with Nightmare
lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
name: bane_fiends_grip

desc: Wakes you up from a nightmare.
name: bane_nightmare_end
